results.content: Though I know how to use the slider revolution plugin, I am looking for a specific point I have not yet undersood in this plugin. The point I have not yet understood is related to the BE theme. I was given the the responsiblity to edit and modify a Wordpress website where a the Slider Revolution was used. The thing that I could not understand so far is where they  have put the shortcode, in which page. The home page they used is a specific page. I do all possible changes to the existing slider, add, or edit slider. I like this teacher so much, because unlike many other teachers, he seems to consider all backgrounds in relation to non English speaker, not to mention his gradual approach in conveying this material to students.
results.content_html: Though I know how to use the slider revolution plugin, I am looking for a specific point I have not yet undersood in this plugin. The point I have not yet understood is related to the BE theme. I was given the the responsiblity to edit and modify a Wordpress website where a the Slider Revolution was used. The thing that I could not understand so far is where they have put the shortcode, in which page. The home page they used is a specific page. I do all possible changes to the existing slider, add, or edit slider. I like this teacher so much, because unlike many other teachers, he seems to consider all backgrounds in relation to non English speaker, not to mention his gradual approach in conveying this material to students.

results.content:
Animation is what I like about this slider overall...I like to animate my DJ mix Covers on the slider or the top ten LPs of each month for display...
Nice Job to the instructor on the use of the Revolution Slider...Oh , be sure to instruct the owners of the slider that when they are changing or no longer using the slider in a web design, to be sure to deactivate it first before deleting the site or of it's use in that site...could save a lot of headaches trying to get the use of an already paid for Slider...I know all to well...Overall thanks.

results.content:
Quick way to immediately start using Slider Revolution. 
Clearly explained and easy to follow. I like the pacing. 
Nice bit of info about how to add slides to posts and pages using shortcodes. 
Overall it's a quick and complete review of  Slider Revolution. Well worth the money.
results.content_html:
Quick way to immediately start using Slider Revolution.
Clearly explained and easy to follow. I like the pacing.
Nice bit of info about how to add slides to posts and pages using shortcodes.
Overall it's a quick and complete review of Slider Revolution. Well worth the money.

results.content: Na realidade esperava um curso para iniciantes. Faltou algumas explicações para quem está iniciando. Por exemplo, como fazer as outras camadas do slide. Como fazer 2 ou 3 paginas de slide rodarem. E outras explicações práticas...

results.content: I felt like the instructor was just reading off features the entire time. This is a harsh review, but I honestly feel like I completely wasted my money

response.content:
Hi Travis,

Thank you for purchasing my course and thank you for your feedback. I'm here to help. What would you like to learn about Slider Revolution specifically? I will create and add videos to this course to cover those topics. Additionally, if you are dissatisfied I will personally refund you the price you paid for this course.

Thanks again,
John
